content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: ARMCD
      operator: longer_than
      value: 20
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.27.1
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Verify ARMCD value length is <= 20
Outcome:
  Message: ARMCD value length is greater than 20
  Output Variables:
    - ARMCD
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '27.1'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: ARMCD is limited to 20 characters, but does not have
                  special character restrictions.
                Document: SENDIG v3.1
                Section: 4.2.1
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
      - TRIAL DESIGN
  Domains:
    Include:
      - DM
      - TA
      - TX

Outcome.Message: ARMCD value length is greater than 20

Citations.Cited_Guidance: ARMCD is limited to 20 characters, but does not have special character restrictions.
